title: HTTP Missing Security Headers
description: This template searches for missing HTTP security headers. The impact of these missing headers can vary.
steps_to_reproduce:
curl command to reproduce the request:
`curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/36.0.1985.67 Safari/537.36' 'https://example.com'`
unsaved_request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/36.0.1985.67 Safari/537.36
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
unsaved_response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Cache-Control: private
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8
Date: Mon, 13 Mar 2023 08:01:51 GMT
Server: Microsoft-IIS/10.0
Vary: Accept-Encoding

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <title>EXAMPLE.COM</title>
</head>

<body>
</body>

</html>

title: favicon-detection
steps_to_reproduce:
curl command to reproduce the request:
`curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_9_2) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/52.0.2762.73 Safari/537.36' 'https://example.com/favicon.ico'`
